quotes: They taste like...burning.

name: Rainier Wolfcastle
quotes: My eyes! The goggles do nothing!

name: Principal Skinner
quotes: Hello, Simpson. I'm riding the bus today because Mother hid my car keys to punish me for talking to a woman on the phone. She was right to do it.

name: Frank Grimes
quotes: I live in a single room above a bowling alley...and below another bowling alley.

name: Homer Simpson
quotes: All I'm gonna use this bed for is sleeping, eating and maybe building a little fort.

name: Otto
quotes: Oh, wow, windows. I don't think I could afford this place.

name: Milhouse Van Houten
quotes: Remember the time he ate my goldfish? And you lied and said I never had a goldfish. Then why did I have the bowl, Bart? Why did I have the bowl?

name: Nelson Muntz
quotes: Shoplifting is a victimless crime, like punching someone in the dark.

name: Dr. Nick
quotes: Ah, be creative. Instead of making sandwiches with bread, use Pop-Tarts. Instead of chewing gum, chew bacon.

name: Chief Wiggum
quotes: Hey, I'm the chief here. Bake him away, toys.

quotes: Who needs the kwickie mart.... I doooo

name: Bart Simpson
quotes: You're turning me into a criminal when all I want to be is a petty thug.

name: Abe Simpson
quotes: Why are you people avoiding me? Does my withered face remind you of the grim specter of death?
I used to be with it. But then they changed what it was. Now what I'm with isn't it, and what's it seems scary and weird. It'll happen to you.

name: Comic Book Guy
quotes: Last night's 'Itchy & Scratchy' was, without a doubt, the worst episode ever. Rest assured that I was on the Internet within minutes, registering my disgust throughout the world.

quotes: Ahh! Sweet liquor eases the pain.
